error.signature: Error: Cycle detected in resource dependencies

verdict.summary: Terraform dependency graph has a circular reference between resources.

dead_ends.why_fails: Explicitly creates the cycle that Terraform detected

dead_ends.action: Using terraform taint on one of the resources
dead_ends.why_fails: Does not break the cycle; just marks for recreation

workarounds.action: Identify the cycle with terraform graph | dot -Tsvg > graph.svg and break it
workarounds.how: Visualize dependencies and remove the circular reference

workarounds.action: Use data sources or outputs instead of direct references to break the cycle
workarounds.how: Replace direct resource references with data source lookups where possible

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Both produce similar messages, but 'cycle-detected' and 'resource-already-exists' differ in root cause and environment context.
